_sText:
This is the awp version of de_favela_rio.

Terrorists spawn in various balconies and roofs in the higher part of the favela, whilst CTs spawn in the low part of the favela. HE grenades are also available. The roofs are assessible by the exposed pipes on the walls which can be climbed.

It offers a very unique and non conventional gameplay. Players must know and be always aware of the ennemies sniper spots.

A nav file included in bsp. Playing with bots is also quite fun in this map.

Have fun, and give me your feedback.

This is a video on the defuse version of this map:

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/Bl53hkx2GPM" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Hastal @ Vista
